net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.principal

Class StormpathPrincipalResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.principal.StormpathPrincipalResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.CredentialsToPrincipalResolver

    public class StormpathPrincipalResolver
extends Object
implements org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.CredentialsToPrincipalResolver
    An implementation of CredentialsToPrincipalResolver that resolves instances of StormpathPrincipal from provided UsernamePasswordCredentials

    Note that this implementation makes a remote HTTP call to Stormapth cloud to authenticate the credential and therefore retrieve an instance of an Account. Thus, 2 Stormpath remote authentication calls are made - one is during authentication by StormpathAuthenticationHandler and one is during Account retrieval by this class.

    Since:
    1.4
    Author:
    Dmitriy Kopylenko, Unicon, inc.
